title: New Music Releases and Upcoming Albums in 2025
description: A regularly updated guide to the new albums, EPs, mixtapes, and projects getting released in the coming weeks and months
author: Pitchfork
excerpt: A regularly updated guide to the new albums, EPs, mixtapes, and projects getting released in the coming weeks and months
text: New albums are getting announced and released constantly. It’s tough to stay on top of it all. So that’s where we come in. Pitchfork is tracking notable new music releases with our guide to upcoming albums. In the coming months, there will be big new releases from Wednesday, Big Thief, Wet Leg, Alex G, Wolf Alice, Sabrina Carpenter, Lucrecia Dalt, Hunx and His Punx, Cate Le Bon, Amaarae, Cardi B, Indigo De Souza, Burna Boy, Clipse, Leon Vynehall, Saint Etienne, David Byrne, the Lemonheads, Laufey, Ryan Davis & the Roadhouse Band, and plenty more artists. This guide features streaming and digital release dates and will be updated regularly.As always, see some of our favorite albums and songs in the Best New Music section. Plus, catch up every Saturday with 10 of our best reviewed albums of the week. html:
New albums are getting announced and released constantly. It’s tough to stay on top of it all. So that’s where we come in. Pitchfork is tracking notable new music releases with our guide to upcoming albums. In the coming months, there will be big new releases from Wednesday, Big Thief, Wet Leg, Alex G, Wolf Alice, Sabrina Carpenter, Lucrecia Dalt, Hunx and His Punx, Cate Le Bon, Amaarae, Cardi B, Indigo De Souza, Burna Boy, Clipse, Leon Vynehall, Saint Etienne, David Byrne, the Lemonheads, Laufey, Ryan Davis & the Roadhouse Band, and plenty more artists. This guide features streaming and digital release dates and will be updated regularly.

As always, see some of our favorite albums and songs in the Best New Music section. Plus, catch up every Saturday with 10 of our best reviewed albums of the week. Sign up for the 10 to Hear newsletter here.

July 1

Lazer Dim 700: Sins Aloud [self-released]

Lia Ouyang Rusli: Sorry, Baby (Original Soundtrack) [A24 Music]

Paul Banks: Sister Midnight: Original Music by Paul Banks [Partisan]

July 2

Alexandre Desplat: Jurassic World Rebirth (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack) [Back Lot Music]

Nilüfer Yanya: Dancing Shoes EP [Ninja Tune]

July 3

Double Virgo: Shakedown [Year0001]

July 4

Kesha: . [Kesha]

July 10

Burna Boy: No Sign of Weakness [Spaceship/Bad Habit/Atlantic]

July 11

Clipse: Let God Sort Em Out [Roc Nation Distribution]

Gina Birch: Trouble [Third Man]

The Swell Season, Glen Hansard & Markéta Irglová: Forward [Plateau]

Wet Leg: Moisturizer [Domino]

July 18

Alex G: Headlights [RCA]

Disiniblud, Rachika Nayar & Nina Keith: Disiniblud [Smugglers Way]

DJ Haram: Beside Myself [Hyperdub]

Forth Wanderers: The Longer This Goes On [Sub Pop]

$ilkMoney: Who Waters the Wilting Giving Tree Once the Leaves Dry Up and Fruits No Longer Bear? [Lex]

Sly and the Family Stone: The First Family: Live at the Winchester Cathedral 1967 [High Moon]

Zac Farro: Operator [Congrats]

July 25

Heatmiser: Mic City Sons (30th Anniversary) [Third Man]

Indigo De Souza: Precipice [Loma Vista]

Kurt Vile: Classic Love EP [Verve]

Madonna: Veronica Electronica [Warner]

Ryan Davis & the Roadhouse Band: New Threats From the Soul [Sophomore Lounge]

Stars of the Lid: Music for Nitrous Oxide (30 Year Anniversary Remastered) [Artificial Pinearch Manufacturing]

Tyler Childers: Snipe Hunter [Hickman Holler/RCA]

July 30

Mal Devisa: Palimpsesa [Topshelf]

August 1

The Armed: The Future Is Here and Everything Needs to Be Destroyed [Sargent House]

Sofia Kourtesis: Volver EP [Ninja Tune]

August 8

Amaarae: Black Star [Interscope]

Big Freedia: Pressing Onward [Queen Diva Music]

The Black Keys: No Rain, No Flowers [Easy Eye Sound/Warner]

Charley Crockett: Dollar a Day [Island]

Ethel Cain: Willoughby Tucker, I’ll Always Love You [Daughters of Cain]

Mechatok: Wide Awake [Young]

MGK: Lost Americana [Interscope]

No Joy: Bugland [Hand Drawn Dracula]

August 15

Bret McKenzie: Freak Out City [Sub Pop]

Cass McCombs: Interior Live Oak [Domino]

Pile: Sunshine and Balance Beams [Sooper]

Steve Gunn: Music for Writers [Three Lobed]

August 22

Dean Johnson: I Hope We Can Still Be Friends [Saddle Creek]

Hand Habits: Blue Reminder [Fat Possum]

Hunx and His Punx: Walk Out on This World [Get Better]

Kaitlyn Aurelia Smith: Gush [Nettwerk]

Laufey: A Matter of Time [Vingolf]

Mac DeMarco: Guitar [Mac’s Record Label]

Nourished by Time: The Passionate Ones [XL]

Superchunk: Songs in the Key of Yikes [Merge]

Water From Your Eyes: It’s a Beautiful Place [Matador]

August 27

Kacy Hill: But Anyway, No Worries! EP [Nettwerk]

August 29

The Beths: Straight Line Was a Lie [Anti-]

Eiko Ishibashi & Jim O’Rourke: Pareidolia [Drag City]

Jehnny Beth: You Heartbreaker, You [Fiction]

The Hives: The Hives Forever Forever the Hives [Play It Again Sam]

Margo Price: Hard Headed Woman [Loma Vista]

Sabrina Carpenter: Man’s Best Friend [Island]

Wolf Alice: The Clearing [RCA]

September 4

Max Richter, Louisa Fuller & Max Ruisi: Sleep Circle [Deutsche Grammophon]

September 5

Big Thief: Double Infinity [4AD]

Brian Dunne: Clams Casino [Missing Piece]

David Byrne: Who Is the Sky? [Matador]

El Michels Affair: 24 Hr Sports [Big Crown]

Ivy: Traces of You [Bar/None]

Joni Mitchell: Joni’s Jazz [Rhino]

La Dispute: No One Was Driving the Car [Epitaph]

Lucrecia Dalt: A Danger to Ourselves [Rvng Intl.]

Saint Etienne: International [Heavenly]

Shame: Cutthroat [Dead Oceans]

Titanic, I la Católica & Mabe Fratti: Hagen [Unheard of Hope]

September 12

Asher White: 8 Tips for Catastrophe Living [Joyful Noise]

Cafuné: Bite Reality [Aurelians Club]

Guerilla Toss: You’re Weird Now [Sub Pop]

Jade: That’s Showbiz Baby! [RCA]

Mark William Lewis: Mark William Lewis [A24 Music]

September 19

September 26

Cate Le Bon: Michelangelo Dying [Mexican Summer]

Sprints: All That Is Over [Sub Pop]

October 24

The Lemonheads: Love Chant [Fire]
